NOTE: AS OF 9/15/2013, SAX MAN AERONAUTICS HAS SWITCHED TO NOVAPUNCH (and stock too)

Sax Man Aeronautics, as a company, will do anything in its power and wealth, to make Space Exploration Above and Beyond the Mun possible, to Launch probes/Satellites to certain missions, some to find traces of life and an atmosphere, and to beat the hell out of its Competitors, and to rise as the new and Revolutionary industry of Space Exploration. I am currently starting and running this company myself, and I will post any Novapunch or Stock spacecraft.

Edited September 18, 2013 by Sax Man Aeronautics
